title: 'The Age of Disclosure:' New Docu Claims US Government Hides Alien Tech, Not Just UFO Sightings
description: 'The Age of Disclosure' documentary film claims the US government has for decades concealed UFOs, alien technology, and non‐human remains, sparking debate over the true complexity of UAPs and extraterrestrial life.

title: The New UFO Documentary the Government Does Want You to See
description: UFO doc The Age of Disclosure screened on Capitol Hill ahead of its theatrical release.

title: Director behind buzzy UFO documentary hints the president could confirm aliens exist
description: The president has said he’s not a ‘believer’ when it comes to extraterrestrial life

title: Director behind buzzy UFO documentary hints the president could confirm aliens exist

title: Will Mellor saw a 'black pyramid' UFO when he was jetting abroad for a family holiday
description: Two Pints Of Lager And A Packet Of Crisps star Will Mellor claims it pulled up next to the aircraft before suddenly shooting off - causing a 'sonic boom'
